text: DC Universe Online is a free to play video game. It has around 18 million users worldwide. ==Reception== DC Universe Online received good reviews. It receive a grade of 7/10 from IGN. The rating further improves to 8/10 after its PlayStation 4 launch. As of August 2014, the game has 18 million registered users. On gaming platforms PlayStation 3 and 4, the game is free of charge to play. It is the highest profit earning game on those platforms. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2011 video games Category:Free- to-play video games Category:Massively multiplayer online games Category:Massively multiplayer online role-playing games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation 5 games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games based on DC Comics Category:Video games set in Atlantis Category:Video games set in psychiatric hospitals Category:Video games set in the Soviet Union Category:Warner Bros. video games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: DC Universe Online
